title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc, a professional-standard disc designed for night play, freestyle tricks, and popular disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes. This high-tech disc is equipped with 36 LEDs, offering 100 times brighter illumination than any other light-up flying disc, with a stunning 16 million color RGB spectrum.

The TOSY Flying Disc features smart modes for brightness level control and timer functionality. Its advanced motion sensors enable auto light-up, making it perfect for night-time games. The disc is rechargeable, providing up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of match time on a single 30-minute charge via the included USB Type C to C cable. Weighing in at 175 grams, this disc meets professional ultimate standards and is highly durable, with a waterproof design for all-weather play.

Experience the future of disc sports with the TOSY Flying Disc, a game-changer in disc technology, offering unparalleled brightness, smart features, and long-lasting performance. Upgrade your game today!
